name: Streadata.io API Gallery - EVRYTHNG
description: This is a repository of evrythng APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: EVRYTHNG
apis.description: EVRYTHNG is the market leading internet of things platform for consumer product brands. Now individual product items can tell their stories to your business and your consumers throughout their lifecycle.
